page.title: 08Social activities
page.content: 3.The Stackpole Church Youth Club meets weekly.Amongst its activities are darts, computer games and snooker. 4. Stackpole Girl Guides meet weekly in the Church Hall.The Guides raise money for charities,go camping and learn outdoor and survival skills. 5.The Stackpole and St.Petrox Senior Citizens Committee. This organisation was set up to provide a few comforts for the pensioners.A Christmas dinner is held each year,loss are delivered and Â£2 is given to each senior citizen.Events are held to raise money. Two other organisations exist in the Stackpole area namely the Stackpole and St. Petrox Community Council,and the Stackpole Parochial Church Council.
